page.title: 01Hutton & Shenfield
page.content: {Shenfield,}a railway junction,is sited where the line from London branches to Southend and Harwich.A Roman road from London to Colchester goes through the area and the A12 is an important trunk route taking goods to the East Coast. The M25 gives easy access to London's three airports. { Hutton and Shenfield}are commuter areas with a variety of industries.The European Headquarters of Ford's Car Co. bring many foreign nationals to the area and local schools cater for their children with language units. Unemployment is not as high as in other areas.Many people work in London which is 25 minutes by train.It is a popular area in which to live combining attractive countryside,light industry and all the facilities of nearby towns.
